entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Employ `allows ref struct` in collections interfaces #103323
  • JIT: Unnecessary bounds checks for MD array accesses #103321
    Future
  • Arm64/Sve: Revisit scalable register save/restore in prolog/epilogue #103320
    Future
  • ILLink: Trimmer will map matching public virtual methods as implementations of interface methods when a MethodImpl for the interface method exists on the type #103316
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Logging source generator: support template customization #103315
  • Plans for opt-in OpenTelemetry attribute implementation and configuration? #103302
  • JIT: Lowering's insertion of `PUTARG_*` nodes is questionable #103300
  • Remove the `NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported` feature switch #103298
    9.0.0
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement the SVE APIs that takes 32-bit address as input #103297
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT Fails On Windows For Paths With a Space #103293
  • Use libraries package testing infrastructure for ILLink #103289
    9.0.0
  • ILC: Bottleneck in Compilation.GetMethodIL #103285
  • An edge case when devirtualization doesn't help at all #103280
    Future
  • Configuration: IList properties initialized with Array.Empty not deserialized #103282
  • Get rid of fluent assertions in System.Resources.Extensions.BinaryFormat.Tests #103278
    9.0.0
  • Mono is unable to find assemblies named with some international characters #103276
    9.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: 3 Regressions on 6/3/2024 10:30:18 PM #103296
  • [API Proposal]: Add `allows ref struct` to `TComparer` in BinarySearch #103270
    9.0.0
  • Assertion failed: The class hierarchy should declare the method #103268
  • [8.0][osx] Long running System.ComponentModel tests #103265
  • [8.0] "Stream aborted by peer" failure in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpClientHandlerTest_Http3.ServerSendsTrailingHeaders_Success #103264
  • Test failure: Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.WindowsServiceLifetimeTests.ServiceCanStopItself #103262
  • Test failure: System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.Int16GenericTensorPrimitives.Abs_AllLengths #103261

Closed

  • Breaking change - GetEnvironmentVariable / GetEnvironmentVariables treatment of empty string variables #103259
  • Add IsUnreferencedCodeAvailable feature switch #92541
    9.0.0
  • `LoggerProviderDebugView` doesn't seem to report the correct log level #103208
    9.0.0
  • Unable to build project referencing latest .NET 9 Preview 6 Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #103249
  • Profiler's `InitializeCurrentThread` returns `CORPROF_E_UNSUPPORTED_CALL_SEQUENCE` #103210
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose the `NullabilityInfoContext.IsSupported` property #103004
    9.0.0
  • [wasm] ystem addon update list error SyntaxError: XMLHttpRequest.open: 'http://%(server)s/dummy-system-addons.xml' is not a valid URL. #103060
  • Expose System.Runtime.Intrinsics.X86.Avx512F #73604
    9.0.0
  • Expose AVX512BW, AVX512CD, and AVX512DQ #76579
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose `AVX10` converged vector ISA #98069
  • Native crash in System.Text.Json.Tests in mono Linux x64 #74443
    9.0.0
  • [wasm-ep] End-to-end workflow for profiled AOT using EventPIpe #72481
    9.0.0
  • Change in 1.27.12-preview breaks Moq/AutoMock with loose behavior #103281
  • Continued improvements to Mono Method Body Replacement #57365
    9.0.0
  • Type.GetType(string) can't find type if assembly loaded using AssemblyLoadContext #103222
  • AllocationTick event is missing on NativeAOT #103198
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [cdac] Implement ISOSDacInterface.GetThreadData #103324
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add JsonSchemaExporter. #103322
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Handle `GT_JTRUE` nodes during post-layout condition reversal #103319
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update docs for ByRefLike with generics #103318
    area-Meta, 9.0.0
  • Make all of the trimmer aware of recursive interfaces #103317
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #78968 #103312
    area-Infrastructure
  • Enable cetcompat for corerun #103311
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Adding support for Avx512Vbmi.MultiShift #103310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add OrderedDictionary #103309
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add File.Append/WriteAllText/Bytes{Async} overloads for span/memory #103308
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add Regex.EnumerateSplits #103307
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add ReadOnlySet<T> #103306
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add TensorPrimitives.HammingDistance and friends #103305
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [osx][linux] Make sure host symbols are copied to testhost & in-tree runtime pack #103304
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Check for call interference when placing PUTARG nodes #103301
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add ILLink option to preserve symbol paths #103295
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Dispose XmlReaders in System.Xml.Xpath.XPathNavigator #103294
    area-System.Xml, community-contribution
  • Add AllocationTick event test scenario #103290
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Share more of the TYP_MASK handling and support rewriting TYP_MASK operands in rationalization #103288
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Dispose XmlReader in SchemaExporter when done #103286
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Use Type.GetProperty/GetField instead of GetMember. #103275
    area-System.Text.Json
  • Fix DynamicInvokeMethodThunk hash code collisions #103274
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Consolidate <NativeAotSupported definitions #103273
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add LA64 targetingpacks #103272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Respect general-purpose bit flags when decoding ZipArchiveEntry names and comments #103271
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #103267
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix race condition in HttpHeaders parsing #103263
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #103260
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework

Merged

  • LSRA: Update paths to print kill registers in dumps #103303
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workload] Remove name versioning from coreclr runtime packs since they are never referenced by name #103314
    area-Build-mono
  • Fix `LoggerProviderDebugView.CalculateEnabledLogLevel` when the level is `None` #103209
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix Microsoft.NET.ILLink package #103251
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [release/6.0-staging] Merge #75473 #103266
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure
  • [workloads] Additional versioning fixes #103299
    area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Handle more than 64 registers - Part 5 #103188
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workload] Add missing workload versioning #103284
    area-Build-mono
  • [release/8.0][workloads] Fix missing substitution #103287
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure, area-Workloads
  • Update spelling in String.Comparison.cs #103283
    needs-area-label
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 125.0.6422.141, windows: 126.0.6478.36 #103204
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Disable newly added System.Resources.Extensions tests with native AOT #103269
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Micro-optimize type check in GVMDependenciesNode.SearchDynamicDependencies #103199
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #103253
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 8.0.x
  • Cleanup some FEATURE_... ifdefs in the GC #103200
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/6.0-staging into release/6.0 #103254
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow, 6.0.x

Updated

  • [System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource] Implement metrics advice API #102524
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Diagnostics.Metric, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Move the working BinaryFormatter implementation to a NuGet package #103255
    area-System.Runtime, binary-serialization, 9.0.0
  • Fix SIMD12 spills #102736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Added SVE `Prefetch*` APIs. #103094
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Create ReadOnlySpan marshaller for ManagedToUnmanagedOut scenarios #101095
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add AbsoluteCompare* APIs #102611
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Move the thread alloc context off of Thread in CoreCLR and NativeAOT #103055
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-VM-coreclr
  • Use LTO for linux as well #103058
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Remove some domain stuff from the debugger #103186
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Allow TypePreserve info to be applied multiple times #103140
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add test for invalid trim annotations in top-level method #103182
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Changed TensorSpan and ReadOnlyTensorSpan layout for better performance. #103244
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Arm64/SVE: Implement ConvertToInt32 and ConvertToUInt32 for float #103098
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, arm-sve
  • Attempt to fix DuplicateAndClose_TcpServerHandler flaky test #103161
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • UInt128 improve division by 64 bit on x64 #99747
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • remove unnecessary Avx512VL ISA flags. #103144
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Move src/native libraries that are shared between runtime builds to be targets-driven #103184
    EventPipe, area-Infrastructure
  • Make System.Formats.Nrbf public #103232
    area-System.Security, binary-serialization
  • [browser] Increase timeout for System.Memory.Tests and System.Private.Xml.Tests #103221
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Remove global spinlock for EH stacktrace #103076
    NO-MERGE, area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Add support for Sve.DuplicateSelectedScalarToVector() #103228
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • Migrate to zlib-ng, part 2: consume it in runtime #102403
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • ARM64-SVE: gathervector #103159
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arm-sve
  • HttpIOException when establishing connection, unobserved task exception #102960
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Don't trim ShouldSerializeXXX and ResetXXX members that may be called with reflection #102780
    area-System.Data, 9.0.0
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Add native ARM64 popcount for sizeof(T) above 1 to TensorPrimitives #103214
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] emscripten bump 3.1.56 #100334
    area-Build-mono
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2470755 #102770
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Enable NativeAOT runtime tests on MacCatalyst #102882
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, os-maccatalyst, 9.0.0
  • [HybridGlobalization] Pass non-breaking space / narrow non-breaking space characters #103226
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, os-browser
  • [CI][aot] Do not overwrite `scenarios` argument if they were passed #103229
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, disabled-test
  • [RISC-V][x64] WiP: Passing empty struct fields #101796
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [android] Don't include `JNI_OnLoad` in `libSystem.Security.Cryptography.Native.Android.a` #103231
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Seal overridden virtual method `SetDefaultFallbacks` #100030
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Add new DiagnosticMethodInfo public API #103220
    area-System.Diagnostics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [NativeAOT] Enable `-dead_strip` linker optimization by default on Apple platforms #103039
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • [android] Fix build withe newer NDK #103233
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • [mono] unify and vectorize implementation of decode_value metadata API #100048
    area-VM-meta-mono, runtime-mono
  • optimize the store/restore for calleeSavedRegs. #101472
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add Base64url encoding/decoding #102364
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Block System.Numerics.Tensors tests on native AOT #103248
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix Http 1.1's read-ahead task management #103257
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Intrinsics for blazor #102670
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add SearchValues<char> implementation for two sets of 128 chars #103216
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-11
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Don't use the `emcc` wrapper for bitcode compilation #2612
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] A few tweaks/fixes to `install-llvm.ps1` #2611

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] JSExport-based async main #2610
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Workaround to align thread statics to 8 byte boundary #2609
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet build fails with --no-restore and --artifacts-path #41530
  • [API Compat] Sealing a class unnoticed #41517
  • After installing SDK 8.0.301, and then install the workload. In the workload list, the SDK version under Installation Source is 8.0.300 instead of 8.0.301 #41516

Closed

  • Please give users a choice to disable implicit usings and nullable before code is generated #41528
  • `dotnet new list` locks up terminals #40523
    Discussion
  • .NET Runtime Not Found While Running Dotnet Global Tools #41293
    Discussion
  • [NETSDKE2E]With NET9 preview 6 SDK installed, run wpf/winforms failed with error "You must install or update .NET to run this application" #41395
  • [NETSDKE2E]With net9 preview 5 SDK isntalled, install wasm-toos/maui failed with error "Workload manifest dependency 'Microsoft.NET.Workload.Emscripten.Current' version '9.0.0-preview.5.24273.1' is lower than version '9.0.0-preview.6.24272.2' required by manifest 'microsoft.net.workload.mono.toolchain.current' ..." #41304
  • Please allow usage of system MSBuild 15 on Linux #7756
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41534
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Resolve tokens on the generated initializers module manifest #41533
    untriaged
  • Add missing Restore option for ArtifactsPath and tests #41532
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #41531
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Enable the Respecting Item's Culture by default #41042
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • remove installer from version file #41316
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Fix a leak of ProjectCollection in dotnet-add-reference #41447
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Dispose FileStream after reading it and calculating Fingerprint & Integrity #41508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Static Web Assets] Fix compressed endpoint headers #41511
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'main' #41440
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Out-of-Support .NET Core SDK 2.x Download Link #41396
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert TestPackage creation changes #41451
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Refactor workload set and workload install/update logic #39991
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update Source-Build SDK Diff Tests Baselines and Exclusions #41514
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement dotnet test help option #41142
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • Containers: insecure registries: allow https (ignore cert errors), and accept config from envvar. #41506
    untriaged, Area-Containers

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-11
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Invalid implicit conversion from long to int #8185
  • Proposal: Quadruple precision floats #1252

Updated

  • The call is ambiguous when using collections literals with interpolated strings #7651
  • Collection expression loophole: ability to invoke .Add() method with the parameter type not matching the collection expression element type #7724
  • Compiler can't determine best common type for `switch` expression #8025

PullRequests

Created

  • Add open questions for partial properties interaction with field keyword #8202

Updated

  • Add detailed design to clarify the field keyword spec and incorporate all LDM decisions #8069
  • Add extension WG meeting notes on type erasure codegen #8194

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hints for reinstalling Nuget disappeared #73936
    Backlog
  • It looks like GetDisposalInfoForEnumerator never reports diagnostics produced by TryFindDisposePatternMethod #73934
    Backlog
  • Can't suppress NRT warnings on ternary with refs #73928
    17.12

Closed

  • Compile Error After Upgrading - SDK 8.0.300 - 'Class1' does not contain a definition for 'DisposeAsync' #73691
    17.11
  • Likely unexpected breaking change introduced recently for `await using` #72819
    17.11
  • Incorrect error CS8602: Dereference of a possibly null reference on a guarded string value #73944
  • Visual Studio cannot navigate from the error list to a source generated file #73935
  • New warning CS9220 for Razor code using string.Join #73643
    17.11
  • Filesystem pollution in `/tmp/` #73795
  • Flow attributes on generic types to compiler generated constructs #46646
    17.6
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-35010.20 #73927
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build 20240610.19 #73926

PullRequests

Created

  • Update required VS to 17.8. #73951
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add Microsoft.IdentityModel.JsonWebTokens to InternalTools.props and add restore source #73950
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add a delay for SmartRename if user begins to type #73949
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged
  • Parse `field` and `value` as contextual keywords #73947
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Expose Roslyn LSP types to XAML and add readme #73942
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Search less projects when looking for linked documents #73939
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Include wrapping options in editorconfig formatting options #73938
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to release/dev17.11 #73932
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #73931
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #73930
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.8 #73929
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Backport #73852 to 17.10 #73943
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix leak of assembly metadata instances #73945
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Change AsyncLazy from NonReentrantLock to a simple monitor enter #73941
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Delay reporting of pattern-based using diagnostics #73850
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, untriaged, Next
  • Update NuGet-packages.md #73925
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Localize 17.11 branch #73940
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Cache the last string's hash we computed in our filepath map #73937
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not report warnings because there is non-array params candidate among applicable dynamic candidates. #73829
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - ParamsCollections, Next
  • Improve EnC log messages #73919
    Area-Interactive, untriaged
  • Follow up on added ability to rewrite symbol references in BoundTreeRewriter. #73886
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Fix typos in DiagnosticSuppressorDesign.md #73933
    Community, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #73915
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #73914
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Use a serialization compatible marker #73851
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove semantic model keep-alive code in completion #73844
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • ChildSyntaxList.ItemInternal optimization #73650
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add standard implicit array-to-Span conversions #73577
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - First-class Span Types
  • Support organizing imports as part of LSP document formatting #70538
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Doc Cookbook Auto Interface Implementation #73906
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve parser recovery around nullable types in patterns #72805
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Upgrade MicrosoftCodeAnalysisTestingVersion to 1.1.2-beta1.24121.1 #73840
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Check duplicate interfaces only for metadata #73797
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add documentation to Values property in TypedConstant struct #73912
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged, 17.11
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2470703 #73415
    auto-merge
  • Update LSP Protocol Types #73911
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • WsFed Authentication Broken when using Lax for Correlation Cookie #56195
  • Perf improvement: json_middleware #56193
  • Make HttpContext available to OpenAPI transformers #56189
  • Servers not emitted in OpenAPI document #56188
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, fortunes #56184
  • Consider creating Minimal Hubs #56182
    Backlog

Closed

  • Identity based authentication using OpenIdConnect #56108
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, plainTextNoParamsEmptyFilter #56144
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56174
  • Perf regression: json_middleware #56185
  • Recursive symlink created while following Components build script #55983
  • Cookie causes an unexpected redirect. #56057
  • Redis ACL using Microsoft.Extensions.Caching.StackExchangeRedis #56183
  • Test failure: CacheTagHelper_AllowsVaryingByUICulture and CacheTagHelper_VaryByCultureComposesWithOtherVaryByOptions #4907
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56146
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, todosapivanilla #56147
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla #56148
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56150
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot #56149
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56151
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #56153
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56152
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56154
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #56155
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicminimalapivanilla, basicminimalapivanilla #56156
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile #56157
  • Benchmark stopped running: todosapipublishtrimr2rsinglefile, todosapivanilla, todosapivanilla #56158
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcvanilla, todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #56159
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishtrimr2rsinglefile, basicgrpcvanilla #56160
  • Benchmark stopped running: basicgrpcgo #56161
  • Perf regression: plaintext #56125
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, mvc #56173
  • ASP0022 - False positive without using intermediate variables with groups #56115

PullRequests

Created

  • Exclude artifacts & .packages folders from CodeQL scans #56197
    area-infrastructure
  • Improve doc in IAuthenticationHandler #56196
    area-networking

entry.content:

Created

  • Autofac.Core.DependencyResolutionException Error in .Net Maui Blazor. #22970

    Backlog
  • after switching to 9.0.0.0-preview410690 project won't build #22967
  • [MAUI]Clicking on the page will trigger opening the page twice and you must return twice before you can return to the original page #22966

  • Enumerating contacts retrieved by GetAllAsync traps #22957
  • Android platform throws exception when loading image from HTTPS source. #22147

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-06-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test fails with connection resolved from provider of AddDbContext but succeeds with one resolved from services of ConfigureTestServices() #33965
  • Cosmos: Allow database management operations using RBAC #33964
  • Make Cosmos function mapping dependencies public #33963
  • EF 7 is generating SQL with incorrect syntax near the keyword OPTION #33962
  • Make GUID keys auto-generated in Cosmos even if a partition key is used #33961
  • Cosmos: Extra clauses are removed from the query when extracting hierarchical partition key values #33960
    9.0.0
  • Better reporting for compiled_query_cache_hit_rate metric #33959
  • Additional optimization suggestions for CASE #33957
    Backlog

Closed

  • `builder.Entity<>().Property().Metadata.SetAfterSaveBehavior()` cannot be used with `.HasOne()` on the same prop #33945
  • Cosmos: implement EF.Functions.CoalesceUndefined #33904
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Add support for IS_DEFINED() to EF.Functions #17722
    9.0.0
  • JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33073
    9.0.0
  • EnsureCreated() returning incorrect return value for SQLite #33930
    8.0.0
  • Table-specific facet configuration with TPT results in wrong column names with SQLite #33955
  • EF Core 8.0: Arrays with Microsoft SQL Server: Any type for which you define your own value converter #33958
  • Table alias regression on ExecuteUpdate on SQL Server #33937
    9.0.0
  • Cosmos: Translate string.Contains, StartsWith, EndsWith with ComparisonType #25250
    9.0.0
  • Query: optimize NOT (CASE WHEN x THEN 1 ELSE 0) by pushing NOT into the THEN/ELSE #33857
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Use TokenCredential for Cosmos tests #33966
    tell-mode

Merged

  • Use TokenCredential for Cosmos tests #33956
  • Cosmos: work on Skip/Take, undefined #33935
  • Fix to #33073 - JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33101
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'main' #33944
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:
  • Fix UpdateExpression.VisitChildren to visit the setter column #33948
  • Remove optimization of `NOT(a != b)` #33943
  • Simplify NOT (CASE ... THEN const) by pushing NOT into the THEN/ELSE #33934
  • Cosmos: Translate string.Contains/StartsWith/EndsWith with OrdinalIgnoreCase #33936

Updated

  • Support ReadItem for no-tracking queries #33927
  • TrimStart and TrimEnd with optional char array implementation for SQL Server #33715
  • Simplify `COALESCE` based on the nullability of its arguments #33938
